sheikh-zayed-mosque-in-fujairah.title: Sheikh Zayed Mosque in Fujairah
sheikh-zayed-mosque-in-fujairah.description: The Sheikh Zayed Mosque is one of Fujairahâ€™s most prominent new landmarks.the mosque can accommodate 32 thousand worshippers, making it the second largest mosque in the country.

fujairah-fort-1.title: Fujairah fort
fujairah-fort-1.description: Fujairah Fort is located in the northwest side of the old Fujairah village. The fort was built between 1500 - 1550 AD, and is considered the oldest Fort in the UAE

al-badiyah-mosque.title: Al Badiyah Mosque
al-badiyah-mosque.description: Also known as the Ottoman Mosque is the oldest known mosque in the UAE, dating back to the 15th Century.

fujairah-municipality-building.title: Fujairah Municipality building
fujairah-municipality-building.description: Fujairah Municipality was founded in 1969 vide local act no (1) for year 1969. The municipality is a local government organization specialized in municipal urban and rural municipal
